name: 17th Century Silkworm Domaine
description:
DESCRIPTION
A reception venue of character nestled in a green setting with a view of the sea, this is what you dream of for your wedding. And if in addition it could be easily accessible for your loved ones, you would be delighted! Making your dreams come true is the watchword of this Domaine. Located near Montpellier , this former 17th century silkworm farm has many assets to seduce you.
The Domaine can arrange your wedding or other special event in this charming setting. It is the perfect place for sharing this special day. The location will delight you and your guests. Edouard invites you to this magical venue. He will help and advise you in the organisation of your function.
Magnificent grounds in an idyllic setting. A superb location for your memorable photos; on the 1.5km lake shore, on the private beach, in the wheat fields as far as you can see or on the lawn of our 18th century chapel. Everything you need for one of the happiest days of your life, surrounded by family and friends. A garden extending over 5000 m², equipped with garden furniture, that can accommodate several marquees and a Garden Party. Our covered marquee, of transparent glass, 375 m², open or closed depending on the weather, can accommodate up to 400 seated guests. A terrace of decking, 225 m², adjoins the marquee, providing an outside dance floor with a magical view.
Full of charm, this listed site has a 4,000m² garden with a view of the sea, a landscape of rare beauty . You are free to take advantage of this magical outdoor space for your secular ceremony, your cocktail party or your wedding evening. What could be more legendary than an outdoor dance floor ? One thing is certain, your guests will be captivated by the view, the calm and the secluded side of this easily accessible reception venue.
A room, modifiable from 100 m² to 250 m², that can accommodate up to 250 seated guests indoors, with a partially covered adjoining terrace of 90 m², with a view out over the lake and the sea, giving you plenty of options for your reception.
Fancy a fireworks display, an artificial oasis? Everything is possible! Create a tailor-made wedding for you , the entire team at the venue will do it. So bet on this idyllic setting to immortalize your union. This favorite spot will also delight your photographer: the proximity to the water, the private beach, the surrounding fields, the lawn and its 17th century chapel will give your wedding photos a romantic and magical touch.
In addition we undertake all cleaning and clearing up of the site - A security guard is available and parking for up to 250 cars.
To help you organize your event or assist you in your choices , you can count on the professionalism, adaptability and responsiveness of the owner, Edouard. And on D-Day, a constant presence on the site will be ensured. To enjoy 200% of the festivities, there is nothing better. Working with a network of high quality partners , the Domaine will be able to offer you choice providers. Caterer, DJ, Deco, etc: he will have an answer for everything! Ensuring that your wedding is in your image and that your friends experience a great moment of sharing and conviviality by your side, this is Edouard's leitmotif. Inviting you to magic is its goal.
Included in the prices:
• 5000 m2 of furnished exteriors with a breathtaking view of the ponds, the sea and the wheat fields where we can welcome you for your services outside. Privatisation for each event.
• The bride's room "la grande Sophie" with its private swimming pool.
• 30 round tables and white lacquered chairs for 250 people
• Our closing time limit is 6 a.m. (music stops at 5 a.m.)
• We provide you with a security guard during your evening.
• Cleaning is also included in our room rental service.
Additional options:
• Rental of 375 m² of crystal marquee, located on our lawns with gray concrete floors at € 1,500 including VAT
• Additional day rate (next day, brunch) at € 1,800 including VAT until 7 p.m.
To play extra time and savor the beauty of the place, invest in the three pleasant and perfectly decorated guest rooms . Obviously, you will appreciate this blend of old and new with vanilla and chocolate tones that permeates the bridal suite. Its private terrace and swimming pool will certainly not leave you indifferent!
Quickly ask for a quote at this stunning Domaine and make this dream setting on the outskirts of the countryside, the setting for your wedding. The authentic spirit and the charm that emanate from it will only enchant you ...
